item.title: Simple is hard
item.description: Check out these slides by Rasmus Lerdorf presented at FrOSCon 2008: http://talks.php.net/show/froscon08 Yes, PHP frameworks do suck in terms of performance. CakePHP is the slowest while Zend Framework seems to be the most complex, in terms of include dependencies.
